Title: Bring It On: All or Nothing
Actors: Hayden Panettiere, Jake McDorman, JoJo Wright, Emme Rylan
Plot: A senior cheerleader is at the peak of her high school career being the captain of the cheer squad and dating the star quarterback of the football team when unexpectedly her family is forced to endure the struggles of being relocated to a somewhat ghetto area. Not being able to fit in, Brittany will have to make a choice, whether to hold on to her old life or give in to her new one?
